txt.en: You have discovered the Cave of the Slumbering Beast!
You have discovered the Highpeak Kennels!
Dire symbols warn against passage into this cave where a beastly menace bides its time, waiting to be wakened to unleash its terror upon he who disturbs its slumber.
Filth and refuse bespeckle this wasted height upon which a misstep is ever threatened by a slip off a high, sheer drop.
Feet that go thither blister and burn, for molten fluid bathes the ring where cruel Gothghaash kneels.
Nardur of the White Hand guards this platform at this junction of passes within the Grand Stair, shielding each gateway from unwelcome visitors.
After much wearying climbing, your tired feet have brought you to the Throne of Igash, the very centre of corruption in the Grand Stair.
